:::Bludgeon/Obsidian/Jetstorm/Godfather:::

::Obsidian and Bludgeon fly to the battle.  Obsidian fires 25 shots from each 
of his 2 guns at Breakdown.  Bludgeon fires 2 missles at Dark One.  when the 
order is given to retreat they fly out.  They fly to the old bases position 
and wait.  Jetstorm dodges Drillbit's shots and fires 25 energy blasts and 25 
rapid fire optic blasts at the retreating Drillbit.  Godfather's tough armor 
takes the full brunt of Goldeneye's blow.  None of my characters are damaged 
badly fromt he flares::

--part1_47.3b71419.27499c24_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
